alert.note: Alert for Harney County; Malheur County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 24 at 1:29PM PDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Harney and west central Malheur Counties through 215 PM PDT... At 128 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Dunnean, or 39 miles east of Burns, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Dunnean around 140 PM PDT. Riverside around 300 PM MDT. Warm Springs Reservoir around 210 PM PDT. Mosquito Mountain around 310 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
